contents.text: Welcome to Datadog in San Francisco, where you can see inside any stack, any app, at any scale, anywhere.
Press 1 for technical support and troubleshooting.
Press 1 for infrastructure monitoring and log issues.
Connecting you to an infrastructure monitoring specialist. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I need to investigate missing log data for our production servers.
Set up real-time infrastructure monitoring alerts for my mission-critical servers.
Debug missing log ingestion from my Kubernetes nodes in the infrastructure monitoring dashboard
I can’t see my server logs in the monitoring tool—please help me fix my infrastructure alerts.
I need help resolving missing CPU usage metrics in my cluster’s infrastructure logs

contents.text: Press 2 for application performance monitoring and analytics.
Connecting you to an APM and analytics expert. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I need help analyzing recent latency spikes in our application.
Analyze application performance logs to pinpoint and resolve latency issues before deployment.
Analyze sudden latency spikes in my Java microservices using APM trace data
My application’s response times look off—could you assist me in viewing its performance metrics?
I want assistance setting up application performance monitoring for my data analysis pipeline

contents.text: Press 2 for sales, billing, and account information.
Press 1 to speak with our sales team about new purchases and upgrades.
Connecting you to our sales department. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss upgrading our subscription to add more hosts.
Discuss upgrading our plan to add more host licenses for an upcoming operation.
Discuss pricing and features to upgrade our account to Enterprise tier for 500 hosts
I’d like to upgrade my plan to add more hosts—can someone help me with a new purchase?
I’d like to upgrade our Datadog plan to cover more hosts for my research group

contents.text: Press 2 for billing inquiries and account management.
Connecting you to our billing and account team. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I need to clarify unexpected charges on our latest invoice.
Clarify charges on my recent invoice and update our payment method.
Investigate unexpected log-ingestion overage charges on last month’s invoice
I need help understanding my latest invoice and when my subscription renews.
I have a question about the charges on last month’s Datadog invoice for my account
